text: @OliverDowden If the public learn one thing from this indefensible stance it is this - the career of Boris Johnson's very very special political adviser Dominic Cummings who clearly breached public health rules, is much more important than trying to suppress #coronavirus and protect lives.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
